course.subject: COMP
course.name: Design and Analysis of Computer Architectures
course.description: Analysis, synthesis and evaluation of different computer architectures. Emphasis on computer design with respect to price/performance and its relation to architectural choices such as pipelining, memory hierarchy, input/output, instruction set design, vector processing, and multiprocessing.
course.prerequisites: COMP 2611 or ELEC 2300

reviews.author: ff
reviews.title: 我懷疑自己上緊LANG
reviews.comment_content:
已經停開幾年，突然間重新再開，又enroll唔到COMP4521，CPEG學生為了畢業，只能來讀這個course。

和另一個post一樣，懶得寫
reviews.comment_teaching:
Prof Hui幾好人，上堂有好多筆記外的內容，結果就系教得慢；
考試時間本來定在最後一堂，後來跟大家上堂討論後，特意推遲了兩天。同埋，個course 39人，上堂人數長期不夠12個人，可能大家都看video？
reviews.comment_grading:
Essay 1: 15/15
Essay 2: 14.85/15
Essay 3: 15/15
Assignment 1: 15/15
Assignment 2: 14/15
Final: 24/25
Overall: 97.85/100
Garde: A+

Essay：今年因為疫情獨有的部分，我的感覺是引用得越多，就越高分，同埋最後寫有咩take-home message和technical lesson，有幾大吹幾大。

Assignment: 全部抄往年assignment及其他大學，改左d數字還要改錯，還要我發email提醒TA才發現；題目描述極度不清晰，不看solution基本沒有人明白出題者在想什麼。

Final: 簡單到一個點，完全唔需要用腦，只有有上堂就OK
reviews.comment_workload:
慘過上Lang，三份essay，總共3000字，還要找其他paper來寫奇奇怪怪strength、weakness、improvements；每次寫完的時候，我都問自己一個問題，“我究竟寫緊咩？？？” 我希望假如日後還保留essay環節，請TA先看一下究竟份paper是不是真的有三個strength、三個weakness、及六個improvement，有時候真的寫到吐血。

Final系open notes，所以不用花太多時間review，而且最後出乎意料簡單，我懷疑出卷時間不超過3個小時.....

reviews.author: tommy-95996
reviews.title: Great comp course for cse and cpeg
reviews.comment_content:
1. Introduction and fundamental concepts
2. ISA and its trade off
3. MIPS ISA and Microarchitecture
4. Pipelining
5. Data hazards in pipelining
6. Branch prediction
7. Instruction level parallelism
8. SIMD and GPU
9. Memory hierarchy
10. Cache
11. Virtual memory
12. Multiprocessor
13. Memory consistency
14. cache coherence

Because I am cse student and I have studied comp3511 the semester before, the second half of the course is quite easy for me. The first half may need to take more time to study. This course may look like provided for cpeg students. But the content is simple for cse students too.
reviews.comment_teaching:
The professor is good and the notes provide enough information for me. After every zoom meeting, there will be a few minutes for us to ask questions.

The TA provides good tutorial notes. If you have any questions in the assignment, you can find similar questions in the notes easily.
reviews.comment_grading:
2 Assignments: 30%
3 Research reports: 45%
Exam: 25%

Very easy to get high marks in assignment and report. If you attend every lecture and tutorial class, you will be able to get at least 60% out of 75%. I only study for the exam about 5 hours and get 70% in the final because it is similar to assignment. overall 80%:B+
reviews.comment_workload: Low workload compared with other comp course. Assignments are easy and essay only need to follow the instructions to answer the questions in different paragraph. Exam has same difficulty as assignment. No midterm exam so you can start studying the whole course in the exam period.

reviews.author: zzzz24
reviews.comment_content:
around 1/2 of what is taught in CMU and ETH in one term (Prof Onur Mutlu)

Not hard, just some concepts and simple calculation involved.  The difficult part of original course content in CMU is taken away.
reviews.comment_teaching: Please just watch Onur Mutlu's online videos. Prof HUI. Pan is not an expert at this area.
reviews.comment_grading:
full mark in mid and 90+ in final. Got an A+.
Do practice and you can easily get a high score. Find materials at Onur Mutlu's course website. Actually some questions in final are directly copied from Onur Mutlu's past papers.
reviews.comment_workload: Light since everything is easy. People all get high score in assignments and project (just a simple coding work in python).
